title: Apt 221, West Mtn View, 2x2, 24 hour hot tub, 5 elevators
posting_body: ['Milehouse at Belleview Station, managed by Holland Residential', '6750 E Chenango Ave', 'Denver, CO 80237', 'show contact info', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>', 'An elevator ride away from entertainment and dining.', 'Walk to the belleview light rail station.', 'The club room, pool house and private dining space at MileHouse are open for use 24 hours per day.', '<URL>', 'This very open air floorplan is great for roommates and guests with separated bedrooms allowing for great privacy.', ' Your large kitchen comes complete with a plethora of counter space and island with space for barstools.', 'The locations throughout the community allow for views of the courtyard, the Denver Tech Center and mountains!', '   This apartment requires a $500 deposit.', 'Monday 10:00am - 6:00pm', 'Tuesday 10:00am - 6:00pm', 'Wednesday 10:00am - 6:00pm', 'Thursday 10:00am - 6:00pm', 'Friday 10:00am - 6:00pm', 'Saturday 9:00am - 5:00pm', 'Sunday 11:00am - 5:00pm', 'Community Features', '* Short Term Lease Available', '* Non Smoking Community', '* Make moving easy!', 'We give you access to the Updater service for free!', 'Complete your moving tasks with one simple tool!', '* Outdoor Grill Area', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Package Acceptance', '* Covered Parking', '* Controlled Access', '* Sun Deck', '*', 'Special offers and pricing available to new leases only, not renewals, transfers or current residents', '* Dry Cleaning and Laundry Service', '* Smoke Free Community', '* Short or Long Term Lease Available', '* WiFi Access', '* Swimming Pool', '* Billiards', '* We are a social community!', 'Find our Yelp, Facebook or Twitter page online.', '* TV Lounge', '* Roof Deck', '* Liability Insurance is Required', '* Landscaped Courtyards', '* Renters Insurance is Required', '* Extra Storage', '* Community Lounge', '* Fitness Studio', '* Disability Access', '* Community Kitchen', '* Professionally Managed', '* Hiking and Biking Trails', '* Garage Parking', '*', "Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.", 'Call for details.', '* Elevator', '* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More', '* Green Recycling Center', '* Controlled Access Parking', '* Spa', '* Easy Freeway Access', '* Easy Access to Public Transportation', '* Rooftop Terraces with Amazing Views']
